question: Which Indian recently won the ‘Laureus Best Sporting Moment award’?
explanation:
When India won the final match of the World cup against Sri Lanka in 2011, which was the last World Cup of Sachin, his fellow team mates lifted the legend and carried him to make a lap of honour. This was named as ‘Laureus best sporting moment in the last 20 years’.
Argentinian footballer Lionel Messi and six-time Formula 1 World champion Lewis Hamilton were named as Joint winners of ‘Laureus World Sportsman of the Year’ Award.
